structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Business Ownership Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of business ownership categories distinguishing between private and public sector ownership, following international business statistics standards.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Private sector
structure:Code.common:Description: Businesses and organizations owned and operated by private individuals, corporations, or non-governmental entities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Public sector
structure:Code.common:Description: Businesses and organizations owned and operated by government entities at local, regional, or national levels.
